background.error.title.token-expired: The document security token has expired
background.error.title.create-room: Sorry, you don't have a permission to create rooms
background.error.title.no-room-access: Sorry, you don't have access to this room
background.error.subtitle.common: Something went wrong. Please reload the app.
background.error.subtitle.token-expired: Something went wrong. Please re-authorize the app.
background.error.subtitle.plugin.not-act: ONLYOFFICE DocSpace App is not yet available

background.error.subtitle.docspace-conne: You are not connected to ONLYOFFICE DocSpace

background.error.subtitle.create-room: Please ask a Pipedrive Administrator to create a room or contact a DocSpace admin to upgrade your role.
background.error.hint.admin.docspace-con: Please go to the Connection Setting to configure ONLYOFFICE DocSpace app settings.
docspace.error.payment: Creating this room is not possible since the limit is reached for the number of rooms included in your current plan.
docspace.error.csp: The current domain is not set in the Content Security Policy (CSP) settings. Please add it via the Developer Tools section.
room.creating.ok: ONLYOFFICE DocSpace room was successfully created!
room.creating.error: Failed to create ONLYOFFICE DocSpace room!
room.create.description: Create ONLYOFFICE DocSpace room to work with documents related to this deal. You will not be able to change the room type.
room.request-access.ok: You have been successfully granted access to the ONLYOFFICE DocSpace room
room.request-access.error: Error getting access to the ONLYOFFICE DocSpace room
notification.plugin.set-system-user: Please go to Settings and set yourself as a System User.
settings.authorization.login.system.conf: Do you agree to connect your DocSpace account? The app will use it to perform actions.
settings.authorization.deleting.system.c: Are you sure you want to log out? You are a System User and this action will result in the ONLYOFFICE DocSpace functionality being limited.
settings.authorization.deleting.ok: ONLYOFFICE DocSpace authorization has been successfully deleted
settings.authorization.saving.ok: ONLYOFFICE DocSpace authorization has been successfully saved
settings.authorization.saving.error: Could not save ONLYOFFICE DocSpace authorization
settings.authorization.title: Login to ONLYOFFICE DocSpace account
settings.authorization.status.authorized: You have successfully logged in to your ONLYOFFICE DocSpace account
settings.authorization.inputs.system.tit: Use this account with System user (DocSpace Admin role required)
settings.authorization.inputs.system.hel: If you click on this switch, the plugin will perform actions from your DocSpace account
settings.connection.saving.error.forbidd: The specified user is not a ONLYOFFICE DocSpace administrator
The specified user should not be Guest
settings.connection.saving.error.undefin: Could not save ONLYOFFICE DocSpace settings
settings.connection.saving.ok: ONLYOFFICE DocSpace settings have been saved
settings.connection.disconnection.descri: Are you sure you want to disconnect ONLYOFFICE DocSpace? This will result in all connections between Deals and DocSpace rooms being lost. And also all user authorization data will be deleted.
settings.connection.title: Configure connection settings of the ONLYOFFICE DocSpace app
settings.connection.hint.csp.title: Check the CSP settings
